sense.gloss: natural, right, proper, just, reasonable, appropriate, deserved
naturally, as a matter of course, rightly, deservedly, justly, of course
at that time, in those days
being in charge (of an area of responsibility), being responsible (for a work role, etc.)
corresponding to (in meaning, function, etc.), being equivalent to
to be proportionate to, to be in keeping with, to be deserving of, to be worthy of
usual, common, ordinary, commonplace, the norm
at first, at the beginning, initially, originally
suitable, proper, appropriate, adequate, fit, fair
perfunctory, half-minded, sloppy, lazy, careless, noncommittal, unreliable, irresponsible, haphazard
situation in which a stone or chain of stones may be captured on the next move
bite (of a fish on a hook), strike
day in question, appointed day, that very day, the day (of issue, publication, etc.)
just, justifiable, right, due, proper, equitable, reasonable, legitimate, legal, lawful
person concerned, interested party, related party
appropriate (e.g. authorities), concerned, relevant, said, aforementioned, competent, applicable, respective
something that can be relied upon
to touch, to be in contact, to be affixed
to be equivalent to, to be applicable, to apply to
to be right on the money (of a prediction, criticism, etc.)
to be selected (in a lottery, etc.), to win
to be successful, to go well, to be a hit
to be stricken (by food poisoning, heat, etc.), to be afflicted
to be called on (e.g. by a teacher)
to treat (esp. harshly), to lash out at
to be hitting well, to be on a hitting streak
(of fruit, etc.) to be bruised, to spoil
to feel (something) out, to probe into, to check (i.e. by comparison)
to be a relative of a person, to be a ... in relation to ..., to stand in a relationship
corresponding to, being applicable to, being relevant to, coming under, falling under, fulfilling (requirements), meeting (conditions), qualifying for
injustice, impropriety, unreasonableness, undeserved, unfair, invalid
being selected (for a prize, etc.), winning
salary, pay, compensation, allowance (e.g. housing allowance), benefit, bonus
to confront (an issue), to face (up to something)
for the present, for the time being
for a while (from now), for some time (to come)

to apply (of a rule), to be applicable (of standards, lessons, ideas, etc.), to hold true (e.g. of a description), to fit, to be suitable (e.g. of a word), to meet (requirements), to fulfill (conditions), to come under (a heading)
to apply (e.g. patch), to put on, to put against, to hold on, to hold against
to allot, to call on someone (e.g. in class)
to make a hit (e.g. in a lottery)
the person concerned, the person in question, the said person
for the time being, for the present, temporarily, for a time
being on duty, person on duty, one's turn
exposure to the sun, sunny place

to suddenly understand (esp. on basis of experience or memory), to come to mind, to recall (in a flash), to be reminded of, to call to mind, to think of, to strike on, to hit on an answer, to seize the crux of a problem
on the occasion of, at the time of
blow to a vital point of a person's body, striking techniques (judo)
this, our, the ... in question, the said ...
that being said, be that as it may
not to mention, needless to say
before one's eyes, in one's presence, up close, personally

sdata.j: ↑残念↑↓ざんねん↓ながらそれは↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓なのです。
sdata.e: It is unfortunately true.

sdata.j: ↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓？
sdata.e: Are you sure?

sdata.j: その↑答↑↓こた↓えを↑知↑↓し↓るのにあなたは↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓にその↑質問↑↓しつもん↓をする↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓があるのかしら。
sdata.e: Do you really need to ask the question to know the answer?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓に↑優先↑↓ゆうせん↓↑順位↑↓じゅんい↓がおかしいよ。
sdata.e: You really don't have the right priorities!

sdata.j: 「↑洞穴↑↓ほらあな↓の↑中↑↓なか↓で↑何↑↓なに↓が↑起↑↓お↓こっているんだろう？すごく↑知↑↓し↓りたいなあ」「↑見当↑↓けんとう↓もつかないよ」
sdata.e: What's going on in the cave? I'm curious. "I have no idea."

sdata.j: ↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓にありがとう。
sdata.e: Thank you very much!

sdata.j: ↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓にありがとう！
sdata.e: Thank you very much!

sdata.j: ほとんどの↑科学↑↓かがく↓↑的↑↓てき↓↑進歩↑↓しんぽ↓は↑当然↑↓とうぜん↓のことについての↑発見↑↓はっけん↓に↑過↑↓す↓ぎない。
sdata.e: Most scientific breakthroughs are nothing else than the discovery of the obvious.

sdata.j: あなたがじゃがいもを↑買↑↓か↓うように↑奇蹟↑↓きせき↓を↑買↑↓か↓うことができないなんて↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓に↑残念↑↓ざんねん↓だわ。
sdata.e: It's a pity that you can't buy miracles like you would buy potatoes.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓に↑賢↑↓かしこ↓いよね？
sdata.e: She's really smart, isn't she?

sdata.j: そんな↑不当↑↓ふとう↓な↑提案↑↓ていあん↓は、↑拒否↑↓きょひ↓すべきだったのに。
sdata.e: You should have refused such an unfair proposal.

sdata.j: それは↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓だと↑思↑↓おも↓った。
sdata.e: I thought it was true.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓はあなたに↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓のことを↑言↑↓い↓って↑欲↑↓ほ↓しい。
sdata.e: I want you to tell me the truth.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓には↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓のことを↑話↑↓はな↓してもらいたい。
sdata.e: I want you to tell me the truth.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑暴力↑↓ぼうりょく↓↑行使↑↓こうし↓を↑正当↑↓せいとう↓↑化↑↓か↓することができますか。
sdata.e: Can you justify the use of violence?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓↑目当↑↓めあ↓てにして↑良↑↓よ↓い。
sdata.e: You can rely on him.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑援助↑↓えんじょ↓を↑当↑↓あ↓てにすることができる。
sdata.e: You can depend on his help.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓のいったことが↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓だと↑認↑↓みと↓めたのですか。
sdata.e: Did you accept his statement as true?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓のことを↑言↑↓い↓うべきだった。
sdata.e: You should have told him the truth.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑当地↑↓とうち↓に↑住↑↓す↓んでいるのか。
sdata.e: Do you live here?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑当然↑↓とうぜん↓↑参加↑↓さんか↓するものと↑思↑↓おも↓っている。
sdata.e: I take it for granted that you will join.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑当然↑↓とうぜん↓、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の↑味方↑↓みかた↓だと↑思↑↓おも↓っていたよ。
sdata.e: I took it for granted that you were on my side.

sdata.j: ↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓のことを↑話↑↓はな↓してくれればよかったのに。
sdata.e: I wish you had told me the truth.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑今↑↓いま↓↑出発↑↓しゅっぱつ↓をすれば、↑当然↑↓とうぜん↓↑間↑↓ま↓に↑合↑↓あ↓うはずだ。
sdata.e: You ought to be on time if you start now.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑何↑↓なん↓↑ヶ月↑↓かげつ↓もよく↑働↑↓はたら↓いたのだから↑休暇↑↓きゅうか↓をもらったのは↑当然↑↓とうぜん↓のことだ。
sdata.e: You've worked hard for months and have certainly earned a holiday.

sdata.j: あなたは↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓に↑頑張↑↓がんば↓り↑屋↑↓や↓さんだ。
sdata.e: You're really a hard worker.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はそれを↑当↑↓あ↓てにできる。
sdata.e: You can bank on that.

sdata.j: ↑当↑↓あ↓てにしていていいよ。
sdata.e: You can bank on that.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はすぐに↑当地↑↓とうち↓での↑生活↑↓せいかつ↓に↑慣↑↓な↓れるでしょう。
sdata.e: You will soon get accustomed to living here.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はいつ↑当地↑↓とうち↓を↑出発↑↓しゅっぱつ↓しますか。
sdata.e: When will you leave here?
